mapper.select: select user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_mileage, phone_id, phone_num, pass_question, pass_answer from UserData where user_id = #{userId} order by user_id
mapper.insert: insert into UserData (user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_mileage, phone_id, phone_num, pass_question, pass_answer) values (#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userMileage}, #{phoneId}, #{phoneNum}, #{passQuestion}, #{passAnswer} )
